61//*****************************************************************************
62//
65//
66//*****************************************************************************
67#define AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_MAX_DEVICE_NUM 1
68#define AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_SLAVE_ID 0x7C
69#define AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_STATIC_ADDRESS 0x50
70#define AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_DEVICEID_ADDR 0xA0
71#define AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_DEVICE_ID 0x58A700
72
73#define AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_CMD_RING_LENGTH 256
74#define AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_RESP_RING_LENGTH 256
75#define AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_SCL_LOW_CNT(x) 16*x
76#define AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_SCL_HIGH_CNT(x) 16*x
77
78#define AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_DMA_DELAY_US 100
79#define AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_DMA_TIMEOUT_CNT 10000
81
82//*****************************************************************************
83//
84// Global type definitions.
85//
86//*****************************************************************************
87typedef enum
88{
89 AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_STATUS_SUCCESS,
90 AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_STATUS_ERROR,
91 AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_STATUS_INVALID_HANDLE,
92 AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_STATUS_IN_USE,
93 AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_STATUS_TIMEOUT,
94 AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_STATUS_OUT_OF_RANGE,
95 AM_DEVICES_MB85RC1MT_STATUS_INVALID_ARG,
96} am_devices_i3c_mb85rc1mt_status_e;
97
98typedef struct
99{
100 uint32_t *pCmdRingBuf;
101 uint32_t ui32CmdRingBufLen;
102 uint32_t *pRespRingBuf;
103 uint32_t ui32RespRingBufLen;
104
105 uint32_t (*pfnI3cTimeoutCallback)(bool *pDMAComplete);
106 bool *pDMAComplete;
107} am_devices_i3c_mb85rc1mt_dma_config_t;
108typedef struct
109{
110 // Host config
111 am_hal_i3c_xfer_mode_e eTransferMode;
112 am_hal_i3c_speed_mode_e eSpeedMode;
113
114 //Device config
115 uint8_t ui8DynamicAddr;
116 am_devices_i3c_mb85rc1mt_dma_config_t sI3cDmaCfg;
117} am_devices_i3c_mb85rc1mt_config_t;
118

120// Typedef for I3C device callback function
121//
122typedef uint32_t (*am_devices_i3c_cb_t)(void *pCallbackCtxt);
